name: Train Game
description:
Hello!

Before you start playing, these are the controls:

  • Hold mouse to move shovel
  • Hold space or enter to speed up coal drops
  • A, D or left, right to rotate shovel

This game was created for the Godot Community Game Jam - June 2018.

It was created by two people, one doing the programming and engine work, and one creating assets. All code and assets were created after the jam started. 

Apologies for the obvious errors such as the tiny game window and general lack of gameplay, but this was after all our very first game and we thought something a bit artsy would be easier for us to make. If you really like the concept we're sorry to say that we won't update the game in the foreseeable future.

We wish to keep all rights to the game assets (sprites, images, audio) but the source code can be found here: https://github.com/MOTORBiKARN/Train-Game, although we don't recommend you use it (it's pretty bad!).

Thanks for checking out our game!
